front.title: Use case scenarios for Distributed Mobility Management

abstract.t: This document explores applicability of Distributed MobilityManagement (DMM) and use case scenarios for different parts of themobile network. DMM approaches and scenarios are divided into twocases: partially and fully distributed. For each case, benefits andissues are provided. It also refers to applicability of existingprotocols and necessity of development of new protocols in order toprovide a guideline for best suited solutions for the targetarchitecture.
